pages.text: As we all know, red buckets contain every possible tool. Thats why this item exists! With this bucket, you can summon any netherite tool. This tool will be overenchanted. For example, if you summon a pickaxe, it will summon a netherite pickaxe enchanted with Fortune X and Efficiency X. This item can also summon tools added by this mod! (support for other mods coming soon or never)
Right click the center of the structure with a regular bucket to create the red bucket.
